00016 class Domain

00018 public:
00022     enum DomainType
00023     {
00025         DOMAIN_NONE,
00027         DOMAIN_CONSTANT,
00029         DOMAIN_RANGE,
00031         DOMAIN_POINT,
00033         DOMAIN_SPHERE,
00035         DOMAIN_LINE,
00037         DOMAIN_BOX,
00039         DOMAIN_CYLINDER,
00041         DOMAIN_DISK,
00043         DOMAIN_RECTANGLE,
00045         DOMAIN_TRIANGLE,
00047         DOMAIN_COUNT
00048     };
00049 
00051     Domain();
00052 
00054     void        setConstant( float c );
00055 
00057     void        setRange( float x0, float x1 );
00058 
00060     void        setPoint( const float3& point );
00061 
00063     void        setSphere( const float3& center, float inradius, float outradius );
00064 
00066     void        setLine( const float3& start, const float3& end );
00067 
00069     void        setBox( const float3& mindim, const float3& maxdim );
00070 
00072     void        setCylinder( const float3& start, const float3& end, float inradius, float outradius );
00073 
00075     void        setDisk( const float3& origin, const float3& normal, float inradius, float outradius );
00076 
00078     void        setRectangle( const float3& origin, const float3& u, const float3& v );
00079 
00081     void        setTriangle( const float3& v0, const float3& v1, const float3& v2 );
00082 
00088     float3      getRandomFloat3() const;
00089 
00095     float       getRandomFloat() const;
00096 
00103     void        getRandom( float3* v ) const            {*v=getRandomFloat3();}
00104 
00111     void        getRandom( float* v ) const             {*v=getRandomFloat();}
00112 
00116     bool        isZero() const                          {return m_type == DOMAIN_CONSTANT && m_data.constant.c == 0.f;}
00117 
00121     DomainType  type() const                            {return m_type;}
00122 
00127     static DomainType   toDomainType( const char* str );
00128 
00132     static int          getParameterCount( DomainType type );
00133 
00134 private:
00135     struct Constant
00136     {
00137         float c;
00138     };
00139 
00140     struct Range
00141     {
00142         float x0, x1;
00143     };
00144 
00145     struct Point
00146     {
00147         float x, y, z;
00148     };
00149 
00150     struct Sphere
00151     {
00152         float x, y, z;
00153         float r1, r2;
00154     };
00155 
00156     struct Line
00157     {
00158         float x1, y1, z1;
00159         float x2, y2, z2;
00160     };
00161 
00162     struct Box
00163     {
00164         float x1, y1, z1;
00165         float x2, y2, z2;
00166     };
00167 
00168     struct Cylinder
00169     {
00170         float x1, y1, z1;
00171         float x2, y2, z2;
00172         float r1, r2;
00173     };
00174 
00175     struct Disk
00176     {
00177         float ox, oy, oz;
00178         float nx, ny, nz;
00179         float r1, r2;
00180     };
00181 
00182     struct Rectangle
00183     {
00184         float ox, oy, oz;
00185         float ux, uy, uz;
00186         float vx, vy, vz;
00187     };
00188 
00189     struct Triangle
00190     {
00191         float ox, oy, oz;
00192         float ux, uy, uz;
00193         float vx, vy, vz;
00194     };
00195 
00196     union DomainData
00197     {
00198         Constant    constant;
00199         Range       range;
00200         Point       point;
00201         Sphere      sphere;
00202         Line        line;
00203         Box         box;
00204         Cylinder    cylinder;
00205         Disk        disk;
00206         Rectangle   rectangle;
00207         Triangle    triangle;
00208     };
00209 
00210     DomainData  m_data;
